name: superdelegate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a delegate to the Democratic National Convention or the Republican National Convention who has not been elected, usually one who has been given the position because they are a party leader or an official. Superdelegates are free to vote for whichever candidate they want, unlike elected delegates, who have to vote for the candidate selected by the voters in their state.
